Uninstall quintagroup.plonetabs
open /ksstestportal/prefs_install_products_form
check //form[not(contains(@action, '/installProducts')) and contains(@action, '/portal_quickinstaller')]//input[@id='quintagroup.plonetabs']
clickAndWait //input[@value='Uninstall']
assertElementPresent //form[contains(@action, '/installProducts')]//input[@id='quintagroup.plonetabs']
